    • Method Detail

      • repaint

        protected abstract void repaint(IOLocation loc,
                                boolean thumbnail)
        This will be called on the event dispatch thread when the GraphicsCache has indicated the loc has a new graphic available.
        Parameters:
        loc -
        thumbnail - if true then a thumbnail is available, if false then an icon is available.

      • installGUI

        protected abstract void installGUI(javax.swing.JComponent comp)
        This is called during the installUI method to set up the controls visible in this LocationBrowserUI.
        Parameters:
        comp - the panel to install the GUI in.

      • synchronizeDirectoryContents

        protected abstract void synchronizeDirectoryContents()
        This will be called on the event dispatch thread when browser.getListModel() has changed.

      • stringTyped

        protected void stringTyped(java.lang.String s)
        This is called by typingListener when the user has typed a string. By default it will select the first item in the directory that starts with the same text.

      • getVisibleLocationSize

        public abstract int getVisibleLocationSize()
        Returns the number of currently visible locations. If this is zero, then an indeterminant progress bar may appear while this location is still loading.
